thread.title: This hotel grossed me out. Carpets, stairs, halls absolutely repulsive.
thread.title_full: This hotel grossed me out. Carpets, stairs, halls absolutely repulsive. - Review of Riff Chelsea, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: nycvisitor498
title: This hotel grossed me out. Carpets, stairs, halls absolutely repulsive.
text:
If I lay in the bed and turned down the lights and only looked at the wall in front of me, it was passable. Thin windows, loud street noise, one rough towel, no wash cloth. Hallways, carpets, stairs absolutely horrible. Depressing.
Room Tip: close your eyes the entire time. See more room tips
